title: If CertainlyT Had Designed the Death Star
body:
Episode IV would have been named, No Hope

And the Empire would have won.

replies.body: I want to see what would happen if CertainlyT designed a CertainlyT meme.
The boards would lose their collective shit because all other memes would be rendered inferior in their eyes.

It would deal %HP true damage to all other memes while stealing a %AP and %AD from them and if they fail their dex check it also blocks all their lols for 1.5+0.25 seconds per chuckle on a 2 second CD with a mana cost of 5.
Pft, mana costs? Ya right.
It would be like that time Obama said "Thanks, Obama" sarcastically.

He would get double the upvotes and you wouldn't be able to hit the downvote button, as it would just dash around dodging everything. Let's not forget that if a mod tried to take the post down, he would just negate it with his fart wall.
A true damage fart wall
This needs to be quoted out of context as often as possible.
All that True damage....

He would make a new type of damage alongside true, magic and physical damage

False damage
The damage that cause enemy abilities to deal their damege to them on casting.

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1gLV6khz,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-01-11T18:07:17.024+0000)
>
> I want to see what would happen if CertainlyT designed a CertainlyT meme.

It would be the ultimate anti-meme:  Like the opposite of _**"The Game."**_

It would dominate Memes & Games Boards and frustrate thousands of innocent memers who will lose their homes.
Also a whale would eat Meddler and large comet would fall down on Riot HQ.

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1gLV6khz,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-01-11T18:07:17.024+0000)
>
> I want to see what would happen if CertainlyT designed a CertainlyT meme.

Hey, sorry for asking such off topic things, but do you happen to know the reason behind taking down the Sion Promo page? It's been inaccessabe for a while. And... well... there's a theory that it has something to do with a certain VGU... {{champion:50}}
Even If he knew and it meant more, I feel like he'd leave such teasers for Reav3.
He's writing Swain, he may be rewriting some of the materials to do with him :3
Only he would enjoy it.

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=1gLV6khz,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-01-11T18:07:17.024+0000)
>
> I want to see what would happen if CertainlyT designed a CertainlyT meme.

A yordle character created by CertainlyT would be stronger than Aurelion Sol lore wise.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
it would be extremely fun for him but a complete nuisance for the entirety of the community :p

I thought CertainlyT DID design it.

Its only counterplay was a small exhaust port or something.

If CT had designed it, the core would have been fully exposed.
. . . In a different galaxy.

Rebel's fault for not knowing which galaxy to search.

Its only counterplay was the user being an idiot who countered himself or being sabotaged by his own teammates.
Still fits the designer, tho.

That's silly, the Death Star had so much fair design and counterplay. All you have to do is keep your planets out of range of it. And with how long it takes to charge up, the laser is so easy to dodge if you're anything faster than a Hutt. 

But complaining is what I would expect from some low elo rebel scum.

So what you're saying is that CertainlyT should design our military weapons?

We would be undefeatable
I think we kind of already are.  Have you ever seen the US military funding compared to everyone else?

I'm Canadian.

HUEHUEHUEHUEHUE
The US better watch out if he goes to work for Canadian military engineers then.
It would also have a soft-serve ice cream dispenser and all the galaxy would call the Rebels shit for not being able to destroy the Death Star because "it's so easy!"
The hubris of a man who's designs are so unstoppable they have no counterplay LOL

Myth!. CT's champions have a ton of counter-play. More than most, if not all, other champions.

Of course, part of that is because they can counter-play their own counter-play. XD

Yo Dawg... I heard you like counter-play...

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
Lul sure-ing up weakness
I would have still watched it.

If CT had designed Rey she would've been unstoppable and had no flaws.

Oh, wait.
If CertainlyT had designed the death star it would have had an omnidirectional laser that fired instantly with no cooldown.
Honestly just expected a pic of Starkiller Base

I would be fine with that, I like Darth Vader more then Luke anyways. Dark Side of the Force  and force Lightning > Light Side of the Force. The Jedi suck midichlorians.
{{sticker:darius-angry}}
If certainly T made the new movies they might actually be good.
and just as you say that i figure out disney buys FOX.
Actually, it's exhaust port would have been 4x as large but it'd have a way to shield if it someone remembered to click the ~~lantern~~ button.
It'd have wind shield to protect itself from the lasers
Who is this C man you speak of
i c wut u did thar

typical CertaillyT circlejerk  -- check
Star ~~shit~~ wars -- check

perfect ingredients of a shit post
